title: Font used for "Mr. Clean" logo.
content:
Hi,

I'm trying to figure out what font is used on the Mr. Clean logo:

[http://www.mrclean.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906065730/http:/www.mrclean.com/ "http://www.mrclean.com")

Thanks!
author: ericb

comments.content:
Might it also be [Textile](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906065730/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/textile/textile/mac-ttf/7129/?rendersettings=1&antialiasing=1&hinting=1&kerning=1&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=Mr.+Clean)?

UPDATE: No, I guess not. Some similarities, but not quite.
You can also get close with [ITC Flora](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906065730/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/itc_flora_bold_ot/).
